name: Rate Your Gear!
description:
Made for the One Minute Game Jam #5.

A parody on the rarity systems of RPG games.

Organize your inventory by figuring out what rarity your gear is. Look at the name, description, and stats to make a good guess. Make sure you keep up though, your inventory is never far from full.

Made from start to finish in less than 6 hours over 3 days.
